summary: The diff implements all three requirements (REQ-11, REQ-12, REQ-13) to fix the Glow man face wash product display issue. The backend adds the product with correct data (name, category 'cleanser', price 120, stock 50) via migration and initialization function. The frontend correctly maps the product to its dedicated image asset 'glow-man-facewash.dim_800x800.png' in imageHelpers.ts and includes proper rendering logic in ProductCard.tsx. All acceptance criteria appear to be satisfied.

hallucinated_features.description: Added migration system with backend/migration.mo module that wasn't requested in the BuildRequest
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to fix the display issue for Glow man face wash. The addition of a migration framework goes beyond the scope of simply ensuring the product exists in the backend.

hallucinated_features.description: Added console.log debugging statements throughout frontend components and utilities
hallucinated_features.reason: While debugging is reasonable during development, extensive console logging was not requested in the BuildRequest requirements or acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Added image error handling UI with fallback display in ProductCard component
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request error handling for missing images. REQ-13 only asked to ensure correct mapping and rendering, not graceful degradation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added sample products initialization logic beyond the Glow man face wash product
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states in non-goals: 'Adding new products beyond fixing the display of Glow man face wash'. The ProductCatalog.tsx adds multiple sample products (Gentle Foaming Cleanser, Hydrating Daily Moisturizer, etc.).
